498110.name: Red vs. Blue: Reconstruction (Volume 6)
498110.description: A new enemy, A new Hero, The same bunch of rejects. When a secret government project goes wrong, the Reds and Blues must reconstruct their units to form an unlikely new alliance. It doesn't take long to find out they've taken on more than they ever bargained for, but there's no turning back. And no going home. Blood Gulch was only the beginning.

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
